meaningMnemonic: <radical>Eat</radical>ing the <radical>roof</radical> is a <radical>bear</radical>, because the roof is a <kanji>public building</kanji>. Because it is a public building bears are allowed to eat the roof.
readingMnemonic: <kanji>Public building</kanji>s must make their roofs available for eating because of a law passed by Genghis <reading>Khan</reading> (かん).
